message: I am extremely satisfied with my treatment with Ravi. I immediately felt safe and grateful to have found him. He is incredibly knowledgeable, professional, and attentive. I received amazing help with pain and tension in both my back and shoulders - and much more. The treatment has made a big difference for me, and I can warmly recommend Ravi both as an osteopath and as a yoga teacher.
author: Recension fr책n Bokadirekt.se

message: I really appreciate Ravi as a yoga teacher! I attend his yoga classes in English, and as a complete beginner he made me feel very welcome and always takes the time to answer my questions. I had been struggling with a tense body due to stress for months, but both the yoga classes and his guidance during massage and cupping have helped me a lot. He truly listens to what your body needs - both in yoga and massage - and adapts his support accordingly.
author: Recension fr책n Bokadirekt.se
